title: Episode 634 -  DB Sports Companion Show 07/07/20 - Special Guest Aubrey Huff

itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back special guest 2 Time World Series Champion Aubrey Huff who definitely doesn’t say anything misogynistic, he points out the difference between positive masculinity and toxic masculinity and why society is in di...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back special guest 2 Time World Series Champion Aubrey Huff who definitely doesn’t say anything misogynistic, he points out the difference between positive masculinity and toxic masculinity and why society is in dire need of it right now, the three call on major athletes such as Lebron James to take more responsibility in the political agendas they wish to push, and Ross offers Aubrey a vasectomy.

www.ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
